00016 #ifndef DFUFP2IM_H  /* avoid re-inclusion */
00017 #define DFUFP2IM_H
00018 
00019 #include "H4api_adpt.h"
00020 
00021 /* Input structure */
00022 typedef struct
00023   {
00024       int32       hdim;         /* horizontal dimension of input data */
00025       int32       vdim;         /* vertical dimension of input data */
00026       intn        is_pal;       /* flag to tell whether there is a palette */
00027       intn        is_vscale;    /* flag telling whether vertical scale included  */
00028       intn        is_hscale;    /* flag telling whether horizonatal scale included */
00029       intn        ct_method;    /* color transform method: EXPAND or INTERP */
00030       float32     max;          /* max value of data */
00031       float32     min;          /* min value of the data */
00032       float32    *hscale;       /* horizontal scale */
00033       float32    *vscale;       /* vertical scale */
00034       float32    *data;         /* floating point data */
00035   }
00036 Input;
00037 
00038 /* Output structure */
00039 typedef struct
00040   {
00041       int32       hres;         /* horizontal resolution of image */
00042       int32       vres;         /* vertical resolution of image */
00043       intn        compress;     /* compression scheme */
00044       char        outfile[32];  /* output file name */
00045       uint8      *image;        /* Image */
00046       uint8      *palette;      /* Palette */
00047   }
00048 Output;
